title: Dribbble
description: Dribbble is known for its vibrant and lively color palette, showcasing a range of shades including dark gray (444444), vibrant pink (EA4C89), lime green (8ABA56), orange (FF8833), light blue (00B6E3), and calming gray (9BA5A8). These colors reflect Dribbble's commitment to creative expression and design innovation. The colors are available from Dribbble's media kit, accessible through their official site.
